name: Abyssal Crests
tooltip:
Abyssal CrestsLevel 60

You've proved you can handle yourself in a fight, <name>.  Let's keep the pressure up on the Twilight's Hammer.  Go fight some more Abyssal Templars, I'll reward you with some of the stuff Huum and I have found in battle.

Requirements:
- Abyssal Crest x 3
